articles.author: RFE/RL's Balkan Service
articles.title: U.S. Urges Serbia To Pull Back Large Military Deployment Along Border With Kosovo - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The White House has urged Serbia to pull back what it said is a large military deployment from its border with Kosovo amid rising tensions after deadly clashes this week in a Kosovar village.
articles.content: The United Nations will send a mission to Nagorno-Karabakh this weekend, a UN spokesman said after Azerbaijan invited UN agencies to visit the region to monitor the situation there as an exodus of et… [+5935 chars]

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová
articles.title: With Kremlin apologist leading the polls, Slovakia vote threatens country’s support for Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: Slovaks are voting in a parliamentary election on Saturday, a knife-edge vote that could radically reshape Slovakia’s approach to Ukraine and create deep rifts within NATO and the European Union.
articles.content:

articles.title: Getting late early: Europe exerts will on U.S. on Day 1 of Ryder Cup - NBC Sports
